sentence.Network_en: Change the attributive clauses in the following sentences into participial phrase.

entry.def: In grammar, participial means relating to a participle.

means.word_mean: 1. a non-finite form of the verb; in English it is used adjectivally and to form compound tenses
1. of or relating to or consisting of participles;
